attributes.action: Change the legal sex age and have it as; no one above the age of 16 can have sex with someone below the age of 16 for both hetrosexual and homosexual
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is common sense we cant tell our youth not to have sex, theres no way we can stop them, and underage sex is on the rise. We can stop older people from sleeping with younger people though, it sickens me to hear and see couples like e.g. a girl of 13 with a boy of 19 who takes her viginity. This is becoming common and its sick, my solution is the only and perfect solution.
